data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: RS is usually self-limited, and generally lasts less than 6 months. The ____ tends ____ remit, but ____ intermittently ____ 35 % of ____, ____ 25 % of ____ will ____ chronic ____ grade ____. These recurrences may manifest as only one of the constellation of symptoms seen in the acute attack.
data.partBlankContent: RS is usually self-limited, and generally lasts less than 6 months. The dis____ tends t_ remit, but rec___ intermittently i_ 35 % of ca___, a__ 25 % of pati____ will ha__ chronic l__ grade symp____. These recurrences may manifest as only one of the constellation of symptoms seen in the acute attack.
data.answer: RS通常是自限性的，通常持续不到6个月。这种疾病倾向于缓解，但35%的病例间歇性复发，25%的患者有慢性低度症状。这些复发可能仅表现为急性发作时所见的一系列症状中的一种。
